Package no.uio.ifi.crypt4gh.pojo

Interface Crypt4GHEntity

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChaCha20IETFPoly1305EncryptionParameters, ChaCha20IETFPoly1305Segment, DataEditList, DataEncryptionParameters, EncryptableHeaderPacket, Header, HeaderPacket, Segment, X25519ChaCha20IETFPoly1305HeaderPacket
public interface Crypt4GHEntity
extends java.io.Serializable
Crypt4GH entity, mostly to extend Serializable interface, but also to provide LittleEndian conversion methods.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static int getInt​(byte[] bytes)
    Utility method to get little endian integer from byte array.
    static long getLong​(byte[] bytes)
    Utility method to get little endian long from byte array.
    byte[] serialize()
    Serializes the entity to a byte array.

  • Method Details

    • serialize

      byte[] serialize() throws java.io.IOException, java.security.GeneralSecurityException
      Serializes the entity to a byte array.
      Returns:
      Serialized entity.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - In case the serialization fails.
      java.security.GeneralSecurityException - In case the encryption fails.

    • getInt

      static int getInt​(byte[] bytes)
      Utility method to get little endian integer from byte array.
      Parameters:
      bytes - Byte array.
      Returns:
      Integer.

    • getLong

      static long getLong​(byte[] bytes)
      Utility method to get little endian long from byte array.
      Parameters:
      bytes - Byte array.
      Returns:
      Long.
